attributes.action: In light of the petrol panic buying and cash for access scandal, David Cameron should resign as Prime minister.
attributes.additional_details:
David Cameron has been disgraced by these issues and is no longer fit to act as Prime minister of the UK. He still has two years remaining in the role so god only knows what we can expect in that time!

A Prime minister who doesn't have the sense to see that a statement encouraging people to stock up petrol will cause panic is obviously not a suitable leader for our country.
